checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/release-name-sia-daemon' should be added.

Capability "CHOWN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-sia-daemon.allow-capability-chown: SomeReason'.

Capability "DAC_OVERRIDE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-sia-daemon.allow-capability-dac-override: SomeReason'.

Capability "FOWNER" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-sia-daemon.allow-capability-fowner: SomeReason'.

Capability "SETGID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-sia-daemon.allow-capability-setgid: SomeReason'.

Capability "SETUID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-sia-daemon.allow-capability-setuid: SomeReason'.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
readOnlyRootFilesystem is set to 'false' in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'true'.
